channel.title: SJSD Curriculum Department on
channel.description: Recent content in SJSD Curriculum Department on

item.title: 22-23 Early Learning Plan Goals
item.description: Acadience Reading and Math State Growth Goal (1st - 3rd Grades) By the end of year benchmark, grades 1-3 will have 60% or more students at or above typical progress in reading.

item.title: 22-23 Early Learning Plan Grant and Budget Links
item.description: These links go to Google Docs with various privacy settings to restrict access to the appropriate people. Early Learning Plan Grant Proposal Early Learning Plan Goals Appropriate Expenditures Budget Allocations

item.title: Acadience Math
item.description: Learning Opportunities [[notes/Acadience Math/Acadience Math Training Opportunities | Acadience Math Training Opportunities]]

item.title: Acadience Math Training Opportunities
item.description: Acadience Reading and Math Data Analysis Trainings For School Leaders - MIDAS Course # 61562 Session 1: September 27 (9-11am) Session 2: September 27 (1-3pm) This course is designed to help school leaders utilize their Acadience data in reading and math to inform school and grade-level decision around reading instruction and interventions.

item.title: Acadience Reading Training Opportunities
item.description: Acadience Reading Essentials Virtual Training Information September 8th from 8-2:30pm MIDAS Course #61082 Participants will need access to two devices, one for the training and a touchscreen device for administering the assessment.

item.title: Midas Registration for Cohort 1
item.description: LETRS for Teachers Unit 3 ( MIDAS #60078) - No additional sessions will be added for Unit 3 after September 30th, so sign up ASAP if you need it.
